author: palladia
body: Fix tab-completion scenario noted by Sergei in [#495](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/495#issuecomment-186496915)

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Cursor position should be kept at the end of completed part.

I.e.

```
cat ./src/System.Man /project.json
# cursor            ^ 

# hit the Tab

cat ./src/System.Management.Automation/ /project.json
# cursor currently                                   ^
# cursor should be                     ^
```

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: New commit pushed to fix cursor positioning.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Thanks for testing!  Keep sending me issues.

title: Fix case where tab completion is not at end of command
